gameData

Class SQLPull

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameData.SQLPull

  • public class SQLPull
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible to pull the data from the SQL. The motivation for this is then to show it to the user.
    Author:
    Elad and Yoav.
